title: Mask

properties.name: description
properties.value: Mask may refer to any of the following:

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Mask

Mask may refer to any of the following:

Armour[edit | edit source]

  • Black mask - an item which gives melee bonuses against Slayer monsters or monsters assigned as Slayer tasks.
  • Facemask - a piece of protective Slayer equipment
  • Tribal masks (also known as broodoo masks) - a set of three masks dropped by the three types of broodoo victims during the Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame
  • Mask of ranul - an item with equivalent stats to a Wizard hat, dropped by Undead Druids
  • Shaman mask - an item with equivalent stats to a Iron full helm, dropped by Ogresses.

Events[edit | edit source]

  • Antisanta mask - a reward from a Christmas event
  • Banshee mask - a reward from a Halloween event
  • Cow mask - a reward from a birthday event
  • Frog mask - a reward from the kiss the frog random event
  • Halloween masks - a reward from a Halloween event
  • Jack lantern mask - a reward from a Halloween event
  • Mask of balance - a reward from a midsummer event
  • Mime mask - a reward from the Mime random event
  • Santa mask - a reward from a Christmas event
  • Skeleton mask - a reward from a Halloween event
  • Zombie mask - a reward from the gravedigger random event

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Animal masks - a selection of cosmetic masks in the shape of various creatures
  • Camel mask - a quest item obtained during the Enakhra's Lament quest
  • Gas mask - a quest item obtained during the Plague City quest
  • Highwayman mask - a cosmetic mask from Treasure Trails
  • Rogue mask - a mask which is a piece of the rogue equipment set
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.

{{External|rs}}
'''Mask''' may refer to any of the following:

===Armour===
*[[Black mask]] - an item which gives melee bonuses against Slayer monsters or monsters assigned as Slayer tasks.
*[[Facemask]] - a piece of protective Slayer equipment
*[[Tribal mask]]s (also known as broodoo masks) - a set of three masks dropped by the three types of [[broodoo victim]]s during the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup]] [[minigame]]
*[[Mask of ranul]] - an item with equivalent stats to a [[Wizard hat]], dropped by [[Undead Druid]]s
*[[Shaman mask]] - an item with equivalent stats to a [[Iron full helm]], dropped by [[Ogresses]].

===Events===
*[[Antisanta mask]] - a reward from a [[Christmas event]]
*[[Banshee mask]] - a reward from a [[Halloween event]]
*[[Cow mask]] - a reward from a [[birthday event]]
*[[Frog mask]] - a reward from the [[kiss the frog]] [[random event]]
*[[Halloween mask]]s - a reward from a [[Halloween event]]
*[[Jack lantern mask]] - a reward from a [[Halloween event]]
*[[Mask of balance]] - a reward from a [[midsummer event]]
*[[Mime mask]] - a reward from the [[Mime (Random Event)|Mime]] [[random event]]
*[[Santa mask]] - a reward from a [[Christmas event]]
*[[Skeleton mask]] - a reward from a [[Halloween event]]
*[[Zombie mask]] - a reward from the [[gravedigger]] [[random event]]

===Other===
*[[Animal masks]] - a selection of cosmetic masks in the shape of various creatures
*[[Camel mask]] - a quest item obtained during the [[Enakhra's Lament]] [[quest]]
*[[Gas mask]] - a quest item obtained during the [[Plague City]] quest
*[[Highwayman mask]] - a cosmetic mask from [[Treasure Trails]]
*[[Rogue mask]] - a mask which is a piece of the [[rogue equipment]] set

{{Disambig}}
